name: Pokemon Wasteland
overview: Embark for a short, yet challenging Pokémon adventure! Discover Dakos, a small region set in a hostile wasteland, with a unique story. Goals Dakos is a small region with only 3 towns, all accessible from the beginning. I’ve created an exciting hack offering players a short, immersive adventure. With this game, you can start and finish in a single run but expect a challenging and captivating experience. The storyline is coherent, and much effort has gone into the dialogue to keep players engaged. It’s highly recommended that players engage with non-playable characters (NPCs) to understand their surroundings and progress through the adventure. However, players who prefer to grind can also do so. The wasteland theme of the game is evident in the storyline and tileset, with trainers and the wilderness being particularly hostile, especially at night. Furthermore, items are scarce in Dakos so players won’t find any potions in this ROM.
